textBeforeTable: 1) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) on your own? (Q1OWN) All frequencies are raw numbers (no weights used). textAfterTable: [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 3) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) in connection with a group devoted specifically to Bible study? (Q1BSTUDY) TOTAL % 1) Never 411 47.6 2) Once or twice 328 38.0 3) A few times 71 8.2 4) Often, but not daily 44 5.1 5) At least daily 9 1.0 Missing 23   TOTAL 863 100.0 [ Analyze results | Add to Question Bank | View Question Bank ] 4) Please take a few moments to think back over the last week. In that period of seven daysand that period onlyhow often did you read the Bible or hear the Bible read (excluding during worship services) in connection with another church-based class or group (e.g., prayer group, church school class, women's circle, session meeting, etc.)? (Q1GROUP) TOTAL % 1) Never 348 40.4 2) Once or twice 356 41.3
